title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4211.4 - Veterinarians restricted
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4211.4 - Veterinarians restricted

State Regulations

No veterinarian employed by the commission or by an
association shall be permitted, during the period of his employment, to treat
or prescribe for any horse for compensation or otherwise, except in case of
emergency. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4211.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
